herman-cain.name: The Herman Cain
herman-cain.description: Celebrity dies due to complications from COVID-19.

solo.name: The Home Solo Pick
solo.description: Celebrity is not picked by anyone else.

first.name: First Blood
first.description: You are the first mourner(s) to get a hit.

winehouse.name: The Amy Winehouse
winehouse.description: Celebrity dies from an accidental drug or alcohol overdose. Confirmed by toxicology before the end of the year.

monthly.name: The Monthly Mortality
monthly.description: Celebrity dies from the ailment of the month DURING the ailment's awareness month.

egot.name: The EGOT
egot.description:
Celebrity has any one, or all entertainment awards...Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, Tony.
And since there are many types of each (Emmy: Primetime, Daytime, Sports, News, etc.), to simplfy the qualifiers - if a celebrity has the word 'Emmy', 'Grammy', 'Oscar' or 'Tony' attached to their CV, they qualify for the bonus.

lennon.name: The John Lennon
lennon.description: Celebrity is murdered. For the purposes of this game "murder" is defined as being killed against your will, at the behest of another, while having a reasonable expectation of not being killed. So, by that definition, Law enforcement, spies and military personnel will not qualify, unless they are murdered outside of their profession. And to clarify further, terrorists killed in drone strikes or any other military operation will not count.

double.name: The Daily Double
double.description: 2 celebrities die in the same day (25 points for each celebrity). 3 celebs would be an extra 75 points, etc.

skynyrd.name: The Lynyrd Skynyrd
skynyrd.description: Celebrity dies in any vehicle crash: Car, Motorcycle, Aircraft, Spacecraft, Hot Air Balloon, etc. This does NOT include being struck by a vehicle. The celebrity must be a passenger.
